column1: Happy Thanksgiving! I know this year has been incredibly difficult and our celebration is a little different but we still have so much to be thankful for. I am so grateful for YOU!   I hope you have a safe and healthy holiday.
Women’s health care is one of my top priorities. I can’t wait to work with our nation’s first female Vice President to ensure all women get the care they deserve.  https://t.co/pSCIjtMxao
On this Transgender Day of Remembrance we honor those we have lost and recommit to putting an end to the violence against the trans community.
Happy #Diwali to those who celebrate in our community! May this new year bring you light and prosperity.
From day one we’ve tried to be reformers -- and I’m proud of how effective we’ve been. We’ll continue to do that in the 117th Congress. https://t.co/fH9jsPEVh8

To all the voters who entrusted me with your vote and to those of you who voted for my opponent: I hear you I see you and I am here to serve you. There's a lot of work ahead but I know we can do it -- together. https://t.co/WHfWSAOa71
It’s official -- we won! I’m so honored to continue to represent our community’s values in Congress. Thank you for all of your support. https://t.co/ArOPb0hBRu
Today we thank our veterans for the sacrifices they've made for the safety and security of our nation.
We had so much fun saying hi to Team Underwood volunteers and supporters yesterday! Thank you so much for all of your hard work. https://t.co/hsqFsPdW8G
We knew that when every voice was heard @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris would come out on top. Congratulations Mr. President-elect and Madam VP-elect! Let's get to work. 🇺🇸
More votes are being counted every day -- and we're working hard to make sure every voice will be heard! https://t.co/3CjaEYlo2R

Friends - thousands of votes are still being counted in our race and it is too close to call. So far we’ve seen record-breaking turnout in our community and we commend our election officials for making sure every vote is counted and every voice is heard.
I wouldn’t be here if not for the amazing work that Team Underwood has done. To all of our supporters thank you from the bottom of my heart. https://t.co/fBsYm0JTd7
Our virtual election night party is starting! Join us along with special guests @TammyForIL @petebuttigieg and more! https://t.co/bPwZ0l7bmg https://t.co/T6JFau4lI9
If you’re still in line to vote STAY IN LINE. If you’re in line you can still cast your ballot.
If you’re worried about your vote being counted call our voter protection hotline (224) 990-2200 in case of emergencies. Make sure your vote is counted! https://t.co/oNwaQBe0fW
Polls are open across #IL14 and across our nation. Make your voice heard: https://t.co/pA765vztvw
We've been putting some MILES on the GOTVan friends! Let Ashley give you the rundown: https://t.co/yU630wpJdT
Whether you're 18 or 80 there are so many options for you to cast your ballot safely (like Maxx did!) today or tomorrow - find out how at https://t.co/11nNNlOv5o! https://t.co/rKMtp1XJ6h
It's never too late to put up a yard sign! https://t.co/oXz6A23DiJ

At @JHUNursing and @UMichNursing I was taught to value health more than disease and unity rather than division. Eternally grateful to the nursing leaders who made me who I am today: https://t.co/SXl0MaUlM8
The last weekend of an election is always a rollercoaster -- here are the tunes that are getting us through: https://t.co/VICD7SUmTX https://t.co/bh8R1zwtzr
If you haven’t seen it yet @SurgeTheMovie is now available on Amazon! Watch our team make history in 2018 then sign up for a shift to help us make history again at https://t.co/eRr3g6mpJt

Every day I’m inspired by the work our neighbors have been doing to create change during this campaign. But I want to know what inspires YOU -- comment what motivates you to take action and I’ll share some of my favorites:
Your vote is your voice -- make sure to use it. 👉🏿 https://t.co/11nNNlOv5o https://t.co/7o0Ks70QTK
🎃 Happy Halloween! 🎃 We all need to celebrate safely this year -- but that doesn’t mean we can’t still have a little fun. https://t.co/ZqDcGlorQr
Friends you helped us make history in 2018 -- and now we need your help again. Can I count on you to take a shift before time runs out? ➡️https://t.co/eRr3g6mpJt⬅️ https://t.co/aikXkJ9gXc

Don't worry Team Underwood -- we're putting together a special virtual election night party for you! Join us online or with the YouTube app on your TV. More details to come! 💪🏿 https://t.co/m5UoAk8UXI

Small businesses are continuing to struggle during this pandemic and it's important that we look out for each other. I checked in with Bocaditos Cafe in Batavia to discuss how our community is coming together during this tough time.   I'm proud to carry their voice to Congress. https://t.co/BIZjv9idUh
Had so much fun at our drive-through “trunk or treat” tonight! Thanks to everyone who came out! https://t.co/ZEalVb1lhT
We need leaders who will listen to public health experts - and on Tuesday we can elect them:  https://t.co/Dhncn9x99x
The veterans suicide epidemic requires immediate action. My bill -- just signed into law -- will help us deliver the high-quality mental health services our veterans deserve: https://t.co/34XXars56U
📺 New ad! We’ve got just one more week to go friends -- and I’ll always keep fighting for our shared values. https://t.co/Q2rtoa87n8
On this edition of "Local with Lauren" I sit down with local farmers to discuss the impacts that COVID is having on our farming community: https://t.co/hSze0Te0HR

My opponent doesn’t stop at distorting my views -- when independent fact-checkers ruled that his attack ad was flatly FALSE he cut another ad to attack THEM! We deserve representatives who won’t lie to us for their own gain. Help us fight back: https://t.co/uuTDPl6xq0
I had a chance to answer some hard-hitting questions from a constituent the other day -- thanks Tala! 💛 https://t.co/DkV3wxmEQ4

To end the veterans suicide crisis we need to ensure veterans have access to high quality mental health and suicide prevention services. I’m so proud my bipartisan Veterans’ Care Quality Transparency Act was signed into law.

We shouldn’t be surprised that Donald Trump endorsed my opponent. Since #IL14 was carried by the GOP in 2016 we need to be ready to fight back.   We have the momentum but can you donate a few dollars to help us in this final push? https://t.co/EkdQUYNwKV
I’m SO fired up after our drive-in rally yesterday! We’ve got 2 weeks left folks -- can I count on you to help our team finish strong? https://t.co/uokdQ7PZJl https://t.co/TlkcmfIpiW
Join us LIVE from St. Charles IL for a special Drive-In GOTV event!   https://t.co/bPwZ0l7bmg https://t.co/bTWhD6fC1i
Keep your eyes out #IL14! We’re so excited to be hitting the road over the next 15 days to remind folks what’s at stake in this election and to #vote by November 3rd! 🚐 https://t.co/ko9muJMRg0
Now is the time to stand up for our reproductive freedom - I’m proud that @PPAct and @NARAL have my back in this fight. https://t.co/Etr6Fpsbfw

With COVID-19 causing more and more Illinoisans to develop pre-existing conditions a Supreme Court repeal of the Affordable Care Act would devastate our community. Health care is on the ballot - and the choice is clear. #Election2020  https://t.co/YFpJwGo3aH

Today is the LAST DAY that you can fill out the Census! Call 844-330-2020 or visit https://t.co/j5tFUT0YHS to make sure you’re counted. It’s quick it’s easy and it makes real change in our communities.

We’re just 20 days away from the FINAL day of voting in this election. With over 700000 ballots already cast in Illinois make sure your voice is heard - make a plan to vote at https://t.co/pA765vR4U6! https://t.co/X8oUXmlEpm
I was so happy to chat with my alma mater’s newspaper the @MichiganDaily about @SurgetheMovie and my history-making 2018 campaign. Go Blue!  https://t.co/f4qz66LJqe
Have you made a plan to #vote? I did!   Use https://t.co/pA765vR4U6 to find the safest & most secure way to cast a ballot in your community. #Election2020 https://t.co/GeCj1BWxDj
@LaurenCoat Miss you!

It’s #InternationalDayofTheGirl so this weekend my team and I visited ‘Women: Waves of Change’ at the @NaperSettlement.  It’s so humbling to be included alongside those who started this fight for equality -- and I can’t wait to meet the next wave of history-making women! https://t.co/UIDrSydbs0
Today is #WorldMentalHealthDay -- as the coronavirus pandemic rages on be sure to check up on your friends and loved ones. Many in our community need extra support during this tough time.

Whether it’s a mug for your cocoa or a sweatshirt for the morning frosts the Team Underwood store’s got you covered. The pre-November order deadline is right around the corner!  https://t.co/V5PNixqdqt

Black voters continue to be targeted by disinformation intended to cause confusion and suppress voting -- it's unacceptable. I’m calling on Facebook Twitter and YouTube to tell us how exactly they’re working to prevent voter suppression.  https://t.co/72bgfGYobn
Wishing my soror @KamalaHarris the best in the VP debate tonight! 💕💚💪🏿

.@JonBowzerBauman and @SSWorks are incredible partners in our fight to protect the earned benefits our Illinois seniors have worked hard for. I won’t let this Administration destroy Social Security – thanks for having my back Jon! https://t.co/5Z3K7Q3bLP

The @ChicagoTribune. The @NWHerald. The @DailyHerald. The Chicago @SunTimes. Team Underwood is huge friends -- and we’re just getting started. Honored to have the support of all four papers serving our community. https://t.co/0EJGQhQK7d

Friends the election isn't just on November 3rd -- it's right now. I was so excited to join some first time voters and cast my ballot today at a secure drop box. Be sure to make a plan to vote (like I did!) at https://t.co/pA765vR4U6. https://t.co/zkpdXQg65j
I voted today! Don't wait to cast your vote -- visit https://t.co/pA765vR4U6 for more info on how to vote safely and securely. https://t.co/tzyZrsuN6t
Since we can't celebrate in person this year my team surprised me this morning with this video of Team Underwood wishing me a happy birthday. Thanks for all the warm wishes! https://t.co/OYdDdDgXzr

Now is the time to unite as a community. I want to wish the President the First Lady and those around them a swift and comfortable recovery from COVID-19. This is a difficult time for all of us: let's all work together to stop the spread.

Domestic terrorism is an increasing threat to our workplaces schools & places of worship. Our suburban & rural communities often don't have the resources they need to protect themselves. I wrote the Safe Communities Act to fix this imbalance - it passed unanimously yesterday.

I am forever grateful for my #IL14 community for entrusting me w/ the opportunity to bring northern Illinois values to Washington. I'll keep up my hard work for our community.  https://t.co/SSQn5hBG5f

Being a representative is about showing up listening to your neighbors and getting results for your community. That's what I've been doing in Congress and our work has earned the endorsement of the @chicagotribune!   https://t.co/9L5r48FvCG https://t.co/es9udjg1Gh

I helped implement the Affordable Care Act -- I know exactly what works and what needs to change.  My opponent? He wants to repeal hard-fought protections for those of us with pre-existing conditions. We've heard this plan before and we rejected it.  https://t.co/1uojkFEihC

Last week we crossed a line we hoped we never would: 200000 Americans have died from COVID-19. This didn’t have to happen. A competent administration would not have let it happen. And now families across our state & country have a hole in their hearts that can never be filled.
So happy to talk with Johns Hopkins Magazine about how I'm using my public health training in Congress.   https://t.co/6PdYQpac47

I’m getting my first gavel friends! I’m thrilled to be named Chair of the House Homeland Security Committee - Subcommittee on Cybersecurity Infrastructure Protection and Innovation.   We have important work to do -- and I’m honored to be leading it.   https://t.co/3MxjzChMKg
Friends I’m THRILLED to announce that @JoeBiden is back on #TeamUnderwood. Mr. Vice President -- let’s win this. https://t.co/aNHHhjSa3L

Early voting is here -- and we are so grateful for the endorsement of the @nwherald! My responsibility is to represent everyone in our community and the bipartisan legislation I've worked on helps all of our neighbors.  https://t.co/whm1RvXDCe https://t.co/HF7CkJGdhj

I’m so proud of the bipartisan legislation I’ve helped pass into law but there’s more to do -- thank you to the @SunTimes for their support as we continue to work toward progress in our communities: https://t.co/jWCY1wYwk6 https://t.co/bIjop1RKde

We started the Black Maternal Health Caucus to lower our unacceptably high maternal mortality rate and save moms' lives.   Join us as we discuss this critical issue the #Momniubs and the path forward at the @CBCFInc #VirtualALC by registering here: https://t.co/uRLoTWbmBU https://t.co/QlhxoGmOFm
Get your crew together and make a plan to vote! 👉🏿 https://t.co/pA765vR4U6   #NationalVoterRegistrationDay https://t.co/QGQYlL03i1
This is not the time for fear. https://t.co/u55jeoBZIB
Girlfriends it’s time. We have a tough fight ahead of us. But I know we can win -- because we have to. https://t.co/DTOLAT2Q9c

Last week Republican operatives from across the U.S. were deployed to our community to canvass (in person!) for my opponent. We’re not canvassing in person this year so we need as much help as we can to contact swing voters across #IL14. Can you chip in? https://t.co/MnojqV6A3Z

Voting from home is safe secure and easy in Illinois – and if you miss your ‘I Voted’ sticker we’ve got you covered. Check out https://t.co/V5PNixqdqt to get your ‘I Voted from home’ sticker car magnet or pin! https://t.co/9n5jBkRnoW

Each of us now have the responsibility to carry her legacy forward --in our hearts in our actions and at the ballot box -- as we continue the fight for equality and justice Justice Ginsburg dedicated her life to.

Justice Ginsburg’s strength of purpose and the force of her example have given women across the nation the courage to step forward and break barriers just as she did. I am devastated to lose this American icon.

In the early days of my campaign for Congress I had the opportunity to see Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg speak at Roosevelt University in Chicago. It was a Monday evening in September 2017 and I was one of thousands waiting to see her.
L’Shanah Tovah to the people across #IL14 and the world celebrating #RoshHashanah. May your new year be full of hope health and peace.

I was so proud to see my community advocate for Black lives. I heard you and I helped lead the bipartisan George Floyd Justice in Policing Act to passage in the House. This historic bill mandates reforms to ensure all American feel safe and protected.  https://t.co/V7zSNuhyFT

On this first National #BlackVoterDay I hope you’ll join me in making a plan to #vote if you haven’t already. You can check your voter registration and learn more about safe voting-from-home at https://t.co/pA765vR4U6

Friends we’re just 50 days away from the LAST day to vote in the 2020 election -- with early voting starting in just 10 days can I count on you to help us spread our message to swing voters across #IL14? https://t.co/lruuH7jLgA https://t.co/NuLBUC8eOV

Our communities owe a debt of gratitude to those who made the ultimate sacrifice and the Gold Star families who keep their memories alive. Earlier this summer I was honored to help families honor their loved ones when they couldn't do so themselves:  https://t.co/tG3SWveZkf

Showing up listening and doing the work matters. I’m honored to have @DailyHerald's support once again as we continue to make progress for Northern Illinois in Washington.  https://t.co/BOGMsJRo6h https://t.co/ObLHO8ufri

We can honor those Americans we tragically lost 19 years ago today by taking action in our communities. Thank you to the Northern Illinois Food Bank in Geneva for your important work on this National Day of Service. https://t.co/7qwr9qObQt

On this #WorldSuicidePreventionDay I'm thinking about the veteran suicide crisis plaguing our nation. Today we had a legislative hearing on my bill to incorporate many reforms that former VA Sec. McDonald outlines in this piece.  https://t.co/0o93TMoIyI

Folks this weekend national Republican operatives are “deploying” to #IL14 to knock doors for my opponent. To stay safe my campaign isn’t door-knocking but we are having a (virtual) weekend of action to fight back. Will you join us? https://t.co/ucBgqLLAQ0
Voters across #IL14 are waking up this morning turning on the news and seeing our first TV ad of the cycle -- check it out! https://t.co/wTZjaiAlEP
I’m honored to be included on Fortune’s 40 under 40 with so many incredible colleagues and friends.   https://t.co/PJ4ZuSIsbf

It feels like we’re back at our election night celebration in 2018. Thank you @SurgeTheMovie for this incredible project! 56 days until election day -- let's make them count! 💪🏿 https://t.co/ygQO1bBWtn
Just tuned in to @SurgeTheMovie on Showtime and friends – I’m pumped. Talk to me in the comments -- what are your favorite moments?
Friends we have some BIG news – our first TV ad of the cycle is coming soon! If you want to get your 👀 on it first be sure to join the #TeamUnderwood email list: https://t.co/uokdQ7PZJl

I’m so excited for you all to get a deeper look into our historic 2018 campaign through the documentary @SurgeTheMovie premiering TONIGHT on Showtime. To every woman and girl with a dream I hope you’ll see that there’s no limit to what you can achieve: https://t.co/QoBNkCcDT6

Decades of activism from the labor movement have shaped our country. This #LaborDay I hope you’ll join me in (safely) celebrating the unions and organizations that fight for the rights of workers every day. https://t.co/53ARu5uOgg

In 2018 @arenasummit was instrumental in helping me beat a four-term Republican incumbent and become the youngest Black woman elected to Congress. If you want to support the next generation of leadership send a few dollars their way at https://t.co/KLR0Z0lX4b https://t.co/c1mSQHZ2tK

We are indebted to our servicemembers and veterans who have defended our nation -- especially those who made the ultimate sacrifice. I will continue to work tirelessly for them in Congress and honor their sacrifice and service.
From Planned Parenthood to the Farm Bureau from the UAW to President Obama I’m so proud of the coalition this campaign has built. Check out our team's endorsements!  https://t.co/4KZzMkxeNx
3️⃣weeks until vote-from-home ballots start being mailed 2️⃣months until November 3rd 1️⃣way you can help us stay in this fight: https://t.co/Ph3ot1rXtL
We’re two months out #IL14 – make sure to request your vote-from-home ballot: https://t.co/11nNNlOv5o https://t.co/K1K33nB6Ng
Our farmers have an ally in me. Thank you to @ILFarmBureau’s ACTIVATOR for supporting my campaign for re-election. https://t.co/RakzqQ8Vux

In just 25 days voters across Illinois will be sent their vote-from-home ballots and start VOTING! Team it's on. Find info on how to request your ballot at https://t.co/11nNNlOv5o https://t.co/86d6yam3an

Since Day 1 of this Administration they've been trying to dismantle the ACA - I will not allow Bill Barr and this Administration to undermine our health care during a pandemic that's why I passed legislation to prevent DOJ from using taxpayer dollars to sabotage our care. https://t.co/JeNzL7iOTL

#COVID has changed how we campaign but Team Underwood is making it work. I'm visiting porches across the 7 counties of #IL14 for socially distant conversations with constituents and taking q's over Zoom! 😷 https://t.co/uMa9w7kuPb

I've never wavered on protecting those with pre-existing conditions or my pro-choice values. We’ve seen my opponent's plan to take away protections from folks with pre-existing conditions before and we've rejected it. The choice before us is clear.  https://t.co/QpBhMFga1H

The 19th Amendment which granted women across the country the constitutional right to vote was adopted 100 years ago today. But the push for equality continues to this day. I'm proud to be in the fight. #WomensEqualityDay https://t.co/9OZ61J9Eul

Religious discrimination is unacceptable and un-American yet it has been the policy of this Administration since their first day in office. That’s why we passed the NO BAN Act to restore the separation of powers and immediately end the racist Muslim Ban.  https://t.co/jfVqIZvYLe

The effects of climate change are felt across northern Illinois – I’m proud to have the support of the @NRDC_AF in my race because I know climate change is a life-threatening public health crisis. https://t.co/QtabvnuND0

The #USPS is a critical public service -- that's why I returned to Washington this weekend. Attacks on our postal service are dangerous and I'm proud that the House passed bipartisan legislation to protect our USPS.   https://t.co/hkscLI9wjd

While we continue to fight COVID we need to make certain that we're all protected from preventable illnesses. I was proud to introduce a plan to boost vaccine rates & begin preparations for the distribution of a COVID vaccine. https://t.co/Q370tXugds

Our country has been facing a Black maternal mortality crisis for decades & the coronavirus is only making it worse. I am proud to work w/ @ewarren to tackle this crisis head-on by collecting data & making critical investments to improve health outcomes:  https://t.co/3tBcOQhFUU

Whether our carriers are delivering ballots life-saving medications or letters from loved ones the service is critical. I won't tolerate political attacks on our postal service. I’m returning to Washington this weekend to vote to protect our #USPS. https://t.co/ef5JonpJgz

.@FarmTeamPAC just rolled out our third slate of endorsements -- we now have 2️⃣7️⃣ candidates on our team! This diverse group – including a firefighter a biologist and so many fierce community advocates – will bring incredible new insight to our state & local governments: https://t.co/UiQ7ze64YH

Even before the coronavirus pandemic affordable child care services too often remained out of reach for folks. I was proud to lead on legislation that would provide assistance to child care providers:  https://t.co/Or20XcNbFw

“A stronger America is one that works for women. So go ahead and celebrate you rabble-rouser you rule breaker you force of nature. Our country our world needs you. Keep rising. And vote."  Let’s get our girlfriends and vote 👉🏿 https://t.co/pA765vR4U6 #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/hadUmKlSWo
I was honored to address the @DemConvention this evening at the Women’s Caucus meeting. Women are leading the way and are saving our democracy. #DNC2020 https://t.co/ASXC7NMFZx
Want to stay even more up-to-date with our campaign? Join the Team Underwood email & SMS lists at https://t.co/3cgUG1ikHO! https://t.co/Y6oadN3JjP
Thrilled to be speaking at the @DemConvention's Women's Caucus Meeting today in the 4:00 pm central hour! Sign up to tune in here: https://t.co/npYRUcKo7D

Today we celebrate one moment in the long fight for gender equity in our nation -- and I’m proud to stand on the shoulders of giants like Jeannette Rankin Shirley Chisholm and Carol Moseley Braun to continue the fight for women our families and our communities. #WomensVote100 https://t.co/xWgCRgjJ24

This summer I saw my predominantly white community embrace the cause of equality and justice. They stated unequivocally that Black Lives Matter. Those my friends are northern Illinois values.   Watch my full remarks to the DNC Black Caucus at the #DemConvention here: https://t.co/EZjoQ1odtn
Folks we’re starting to sell out of some of our most popular items! If you’ve got your eye on something in the #TeamUnderwood store now’s the time to get your order in:  https://t.co/j73xmLKbyK

Big news: I'm excited to share I’ll be addressing the DNC Black Caucus and Women’s Caucuses over the next few days! Tune in today at https://t.co/yefNEMg0Hq & we’ll post more details through the week. https://t.co/zkKMcgBW1O

Every GoFundMe for prescription drugs is a policy failure. That’s why I worked with both parties to pass the Lower Insulin Costs Now Act into law to bring generic versions of this life-saving drug to market faster so more can afford it:  https://t.co/Ke8kQF5oXA
Getting ready for the @DemConvention... who else is excited?! https://t.co/VNNws8PcYy

The USPS provides a critical service to our state and nation not only as the #1 employer of veterans but also as a crucial part in keeping our elections safe.The Postmaster General MUST stop his dangerous budget cuts and put our country first:  https://t.co/81KTpTdYrL

#TeamUnderwood is campaigning in creative ways to keep everyone safe and connected in 2020! This month I’m meeting with my neighbors on porches across our district and taking questions via Zoom! We're making it work. 💪 https://t.co/Y8lOwslHIC
Social Security is a critical program that allows our seniors to retire with dignity. Make no mistake Social Security is on the ballot this cycle -- and I'm fighting to protect it. #SocSec85

Our public school teachers students parents and staff need our support more than ever. Education Secretary Betsy DeVos is trying to divert $75 million in Illinois public school funding to private schools. I won't allow it.  https://t.co/TyfnBqSlYu
.@JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris are the leaders we need in the White House to guide our nation through these challenging times. Thank you @NewDay for hosting me this morning! https://t.co/nwjBM9gRSj

Today is a historic day -- especially for Black and South Asian women.   @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris are the leaders we need in the White House to right our course as a nation and restore American leadership in the world.   Onward to victory! https://t.co/KOsyt6G4o7

Running for office is hard – that’s why I started @FarmTeamPAC to help bring new diverse voices to local and county political offices in communities across #IL14. Check them out:  https://t.co/GkYsZ4ZpDM

We have a shortage of public health workers in #IL14 & across the US. That's why I introduced legislation to recruit train and employ Americans to expand our public health workforce. We need a Health Force to fight COVID-19 and put Americans back to work. https://t.co/7ZLqzsJqfs

Three years ago with nothing but the belief that #IL14 deserved a representative who would fight for our health care we kicked off a long-shot campaign for Congress.  We’ve come a long way and I promise to keep fighting for you. https://t.co/WKtseTxHe1

Misinformation is adding fuel to the fire of the COVID-19 pandemic. I introduced the Protecting Against Public Safety Disinformation Act to strengthen our resiliency to deepfakes manipulated media and online bots during this public health crisis.  https://t.co/9xBFp6arNh
Check out the deals at our online store! Show your #TeamUnderwood pride with our new and improved merch or try something more retro:  https://t.co/j73xmLKbyK

I was proud to support bipartisan legislation to fight back against voter suppression across the country – but the Senate won’t call it to a vote. Today is the 55th anniversary of the Voting Rights Act. It’s the perfect time to act: https://t.co/usRgdJezF2
☀️? Mask weather.  🌧️? Mask weather.  🌨️? In August?! Still mask weather.   #AllInIllinois
The endorsement from President Obama has me so hype!   It has me thinking back to this rally in 2018. I'm fired up are you?! 👉🏿 https://t.co/wikebBhfbt https://t.co/Sj9WahqSQh

I was an intern for then-Senator @BarackObama. Today I’m the youngest Black woman to ever serve in Congress. I’m thrilled to have earned the endorsement of President Obama in my reelection campaign.   Join us! 👉🏿https://t.co/3cgUG1zW6o https://t.co/vCC5xlXY3C

Time flies! Now that it’s August(!) vote-from-home ballot applications will be hitting mailboxes all across northern Illinois. Make sure to tell your friends to complete their applications on paper or online for the CRITICAL choice we face in November. 📬 https://t.co/11nNNm65WW

The Affordable Care Act is a lifeline that many families rely on now more than ever - that’s why I introduced legislation to prevent the DOJ from using our taxpayer dollars to fight the ACA in court. I'm proud to share that it passed tonight with bipartisan support.
Eid Mubarak to our friends and neighbors celebrating #EidAlAdha across northern Illinois!
Wow today is a great day to request your vote-from-home ballot application! https://t.co/11nNNlOv5o https://t.co/M65HFsRzK2

Here's the good news: more than 100 members of Congress both Democrat and Republican have joined the Black Maternal Health Caucus. There's a lot of work ahead but we are coming together to fix these problems.
The black maternal health crisis in our country is a product of systemic racial injustice.

Here in IL Black women are 6x more likely to die as a result of a pregnancy-related condition than white women. That's not a reflection of wealth or education -- even Black women with college degrees are more likely to die than white women who didn't complete high school.

Today we commemorate the end of slavery in the United States. We know that racial injustice is not a thing of the past we can see disparities everywhere from policing to our healthcare system. #Juneteenth

Today and every day we are called to action by Dr. King’s courage to fight for the truth and advocate for justice no matter the challenge. #MLKDay
